pr_title: mgmt, core, open to azure-core, for f.setAccessible(true); in FlatteningSerializer

timeline.message: open to azure-core, for f.setAccessible(true); in FlatteningSerializer

timeline.bodyText: which class in com.azure.core.management.exception requires this change?
timeline.author: xseeseesee

replies.bodyText: On core-mgmt level, I am not able to predict which of subclass of ManagementError would have JsonFlatten. It is out of control of core-mgmt lib. But if anyone uses a subclass of it with JsonFlatten, you now need open to azure-core, here in core-mgmt.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft
